title: shuddha yOgigaLait-taruvAi
sahitya:
shuddha yOgigaLait-taruvAi indat-tollulaginbura vAzhndiDavE paraA]


anupallavi

  sattiya vIrar dharuma shIlar shAnta dhIrar sarvAnukUlarAm


caraNam    iLagiya manamuDaiyAr sinamillAr ellArkkum nalladu ninaippAr
pazhagiya vAimaiyum azhagiya tUimaiyum paNburu naNbuDan anburu toNDarAm
